mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_user_log (username, ip, address, type, description, model, create_time, result, access_os, browser, client_type, del_flag) VALUES (#{username},#{ip},#{address},#{type},#{description}, #{model},#{createTime},#{result},#{accessOs},#{browser}, #{clientType},1)

INSERT INTO b_exception_log (username, ip, ip_source, method, operation, params, exception_json, exception_message, create_time, del_flag) VALUES(#{username},#{ip},#{source},#{method},#{operation},#{params},#{exceptionJson},#{exceptionMessage},#{createTime},1)
